description: This trap indicates that unexpected running out
of hardware resources to program a Dynamic IP
Lockdown rule.
This notification trap is controlled by the state
of 'hpicfIpLockTrapCtrl' object.
Implementation of this trap is optional.

event.Summary: Unexpected running out of hardware resources (MAC: $v2) to program a dynamic ip lockdown rule

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockOutOfResources HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockAddrPort i 9999 HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockAddrMacAddress s EXAMPL HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockAddrIpAddress s EXAMPLE HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockAddrVlan u 9999 HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockOutOfResourceSource i 1

description: The port that this address binding is
permitted on.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockAddrPort

description: The source MAC address that is permitted
for this source IP address on this port.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockAddrMacAddress

description: A source IP address permitted on this
port. The type of address contained in
this object is indicated by
hpicfIpLockAddrType.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockAddrIpAddress

description: The VLAN ID on which this source address
is permitted on this port.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockAddrVlan

description: The identifier of the reason for out of hardware
resource condition
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockOutOfResourceSource

description: This notification indicates a host was denied
access to the switch based on Dynamic Lockdown
Protection rules.
This notification trap is controlled by the
state of the 'hpicfIpLockTrapCtrl' object.
Implementation of this trap is optional.

event.Summary: Host denied access to the switch based on dynamic lockdown protection rules

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockErrantNotify HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyCount c 9999 HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyPort i 9999 HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifySrcIpType i 0 HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifySrcIpAddress s EXAMPLE HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyDstIpType i 0 HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyDstIpAddress s EXAMPLE HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyMacAddress s EXAMPL HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyPktCount c 9999

description: A count of 'hpicfIpLockErrantNotify' sent from
the Dynamic Ip Lockdown Protection entity to the
SNMP entity since boot.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyCount

description: The port for which this 'hpicfIpLockErrantNotify'
applies.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyPort

description: The type of IP address contained in
'hpicfIpLockNotifySrcIpAddress'.
The only values expected are ipv4 or ipv6.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifySrcIpType

description: The source IP address for which this
'hpicfIpLockErrantNotify' applies.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifySrcIpAddress

description: The type of IP address contained in
'hpicfIpLockNotifyDstIpAddress'.
The only values expected are ipv4 or ipv6.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyDstIpType

description: The destination IP address for which this
'hpicfIpLockErrantNotify' applies.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyDstIpAddress

description: The source MAC address for which this
'hpicfIpLockErrantNotify' applies.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyMacAddress

description: This object indicates the number of packets
received from this host which were dropped.
variables.name: HP-ICF-IP-LOCKDOWN-MIB::hpicfIpLockNotifyPktCount
